mean_cn: adj. 选修的，选举的，选任的；  n. 选修课程
mean_en: a class that is not required in a particular course of study
word_etyma: e 出，出来 + lect“选择，收集”" + ive 形容词后缀→ adj. 选修的；选举的
short_phrase: take an elective course in music
sentence: I choose to learn to play the flute for my art elective.
sentence_trans: 艺术选修课我选了学习吹长笛。
